sentences.en: Ah, the pomposity of his tone , the bluster, the arrogance.
sentences.cn: 啊, 他那巧舌如簧, 那咆哮, 那傲慢.

sentences.en: An elaborate signature indicates pomposity and self - importance.
sentences.cn: 过分精心的签名则暗示你的夸耀和自负.

sentences.en: He hated pomposity and disliked being called a genius.
sentences.cn: 他憎恶自负的作派，而且不喜欢被称为天才。

sentences.en: Nothing could deflate his ego / pomposity , ie make him less self - assured or pompous.
sentences.cn: 任何事都不能削弱他的自信心[气焰].

sentences.en: Pomposity in senior titles is paralleled by largely symbolic awards in the lower ranks.
sentences.cn: 与高级头衔泛滥并行的是,向中低层员工授予基本上是象征性的奖励.

sentences.en: She answered pomposity with irony and dominated conversations by her personality and shrewd psychology.
sentences.cn: 对于虚夸自负她用的是反唇相讥,她以她的人品和机敏的心理来控制同人家谈话的进程.

sentences.en: The Economist considers itself the enemy of privilege, pomposity and predictability.
sentences.cn: 经济学人将自己视为特权、浮夸和预言家的敌人。

sentences.en: The pomposity, the pretence, the downright idiocy: all are gagging for the Dada treatment.
sentences.cn: 夸耀 、 伪装 、 彻头彻尾的白痴行径: 所有这些都是达达主义插科打诨的对象.

sentences.en: The TV show had the whiff of hypocrisy and pomposity.
sentences.cn: 这个电视节目有些伪善和夸耀的嫌疑。

sentences.en: They were annoyed by my pomposity my insistence on taking the blame for the whole affair.
sentences.cn: 他们为我的傲慢自大，为我的非要承担整个事情的责任而感到生气。

words.tran_cn: 自大的；浮夸的；华而不实的；爱炫耀的
